name: Idle Defense: tanks vs. tower
description:
Dive into Tower Defense battle, apply the best with your turret combination attack all enemies and defeat them. Win all the battles!

Idle Defense is built specifically for optimal arcade mobile gameplay.

You will serve as a tank commander, directing the creation and upgrading of towers, demonstrating outstanding tactical thinking and operational skills, and experiencing intense tank battles.

Upgrade your turret and become stronger and deadlier.

Defeat your enemies and defend your base's honor.
